metadata.title: CVE-2024-0565 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds memory read flaw was found in receive_encrypted_standardin fs/smb/client/smb2ops.c in the SMB Client sub-component in the LinuxKernel. This issue occurs due to integer underflow on the memcpy length,leading to a denial of service.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
